activities: Stroz Friedberg acts as a data processor on behalf of Clients and/or their legal counsel during the provision of any of the following services: data recovery, electronic discovery, digital forensics and/or related consulting services. Client Personal Data may be collected in Switzerland by the Client directly or by Stroz Friedberg personnel at the Client’s direction.  Client Personal Data may be sent from Switzerland to Stroz Friedberg in the United States by the Client or by Stroz Friedberg at the Client’s direction.
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, HR, including on-line, off-line, and manually processed
recoursemech: Any individual may refer a privacy issue to Stroz Friedberg's Office of the General Counsel by emailing their question or concern to webprivacy@strozfriedberg.com. Stroz Friedberg has chosen the Swiss Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner, as applicable, to serve as an independent recourse mechanism for dispute resolution arising from collection, use, and retention of personal information transferred from Switzerland to the United States.
